TITLE: In Person
TASK: The In-Person Learning pattern applies to traditional instruction where learners attend physical classes, interacting face-to-face with instructors and peers. Its goal is to foster direct, interpersonal experiences that nurture social and emotional development, communication, and collaboration. To enhance IPLRN, create a comfortable learning environment, encourage active participation, and provide immediate feedback and support. Challenges can include physical constraints, managing diverse learning needs in the classroom, and ensuring a safe and inclusive environment for all.
